meanings.sent1: The misemphases in the report led to confusion among the readers.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the misemphases in the presentation and corrected them immediately.
meanings.sent3: The misemphases in the painting made the artist chuckle.

meanings.sent5: The misemphases in the recipe made it impossible to follow accurately.

meanings.definition: Misemphases: third person singular present of misemphasize
meanings.sent1: He misemphases the importance of punctuality in his work ethic.
meanings.sent2: She often misemphases the significance of small gestures.
meanings.sent3: The comedian misemphases the punchline for comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: His misemphases on the issue created a ripple effect in the community.
meanings.sent5: The teacher misemphases the pronunciation to help students remember better.
